title: 求RPG Player Leveling的变量列表
author: 1140v
txt_content: 请问RPG Player Leveling的变量有哪些？需要安装的PlaceHolderAPI文件又是什么？

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-727431-1-1.html

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
{rpllevel} - Return the player level

{rplpoints} - Return the player stat points

{rplexp} - Return the player exp

{rplmaxexp} - Return the player exp to next level

{rplpower} - Return the player power

{rplmaxpower} - Return the player max power

{rplmana} - Return the player mana

{rplmaxmana} - Return the player max mana

https://rpl.fandom.com/wiki/MVdWPlaceholderAPI
就这些

replies.author: 1140v
replies.txt_content:

使用方法

把 RplPlaceholder 放入 /plugins 文件夹

启动你的服务端，确保启动成功后

向你的插件提供 PAPI 占位符
